title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin preaches patience with Bears QB Justin Fields by comparing him to Josh Allen but does admit time is running out. He looks at the huge week 6 match up between Patrick Mahomes and Josh Allen and which one will end up winning more Super Bowls. He gives you his Blazing 5 picks for week 6 of the NFL. Plus, Mark Sanchez joins the show to talk about the Packers struggles on offense with reigning back-to-back MVP Aaron Rodgers.  

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
